GPT-5.2.name: Tolga

GPT-5.2.name: Ferhat
GPT-5.2.story:
Ferhat arrived at his sister’s home in Kayseri with a small cooler bag and a simple wrapped envelope. When his sister Nur opened the door, he said, “I brought something—one part is perishable.”

GPT-5.2.name: Gizem

Gizem nodded quickly. “Of course, later,” she said, then took a sip of tea.
